name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and superior sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals alike.

name: Smart Watch
description: Feature-rich smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and notifications. Stay connected and healthy.

name: Running Shoes
description: Comfortable and durable running shoes designed for maximum performance. Lightweight with excellent cushioning.

name: Leather Backpack
description: Premium leather backpack with multiple compartments. Perfect for work, travel, or everyday use.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Programmable coffee maker with thermal carafe. Brew perfect coffee every morning with customizable settings.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat with extra cushioning for comfort. Eco-friendly and durable for all your workout needs.

name: Desk Lamp
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Energy-efficient lighting for your workspace.

name: Sunglasses
description: Stylish polarized sunglasses with UV protection. Perfect blend of fashion and functionality.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound and long battery life. Waterproof design for outdoor adventures.

name: Dumbbell Set
description: Adjustable dumbbell set for home workouts. Compact design with multiple weight options.

name: Canvas Tote Bag
description: Eco-friendly canvas tote bag perfect for shopping or daily use. Spacious and durable.

name: Air Purifier
description: HEPA air purifier for cleaner, healthier air. Removes 99.97% of airborne particles.
